scripts.backend:build: cd ./udagram-api && npm run build &&  cd ./www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.backend:deploy: cd ./udagram-api && eb setenv AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET URL=$URL POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION PORT=$PORT API_PORT=$API_PORT JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET && eb deploy Udagramapi-env
